document_data.mainbody:
Belevan Crell, who was also later called Belevan the Unliving, was a Nentyarch of Narfell during the time of the Crell Dynasty.
Belevan ruled from  to , far longer than any of his predecessors thanks to his successful transformation into a lich. Belevans rule, and that of the entire Crell Dynasty, came to an end in -633 DR when he was overthrown by Ulthas and Ulthar Orgolath, a pair of brothers known as the "Demon Twins."
Belevan was the son and sole heir of the previous Nentyarch, Arthauld Crell. He was born during the first year of Arthaulds reign in the .
